biotools.summary: This tutorial aims to illustrate the process of building up a CWL workflow using the BioExcel Building Blocks library (biobb). The tutorial is based on the Protein Gromacs MD Setup Jupyter Notebook tutorial.

bioschemas.name: BioExcel Building Blocks tutorials: Common Workflow Language with biobb
bioschemas.summary: This tutorial aims to illustrate the process of building up a CWL workflow using the BioExcel Building Blocks library (biobb). The tutorial is based on the Protein Gromacs MD Setup Jupyter Notebook tutorial.
